articles.author: Cheryl Chan
articles.title: With a whiff of the European fire ant, spiders get antsy: SFU study - Vancouver Sun
articles.description: Despite the findings, people should not use aggressive and invasive European fire ants to get rid of spiders, said researchers.
articles.content:
Article content
Scared of spiders? Ants could help.
A new study by Simon Fraser University researchers has found that chemicals given off by ants, their natural predator, are a deterrent for spider… [+2291 chars]

articles.title: Expansion of Pfizer manufacturing capacity in Belgium approved by EMA body - City A.M.
articles.description: The Committee for Human Medicines, part of the European Medicines Agency (EMA), has recommended the approval of additional manufacturing and filling lines at Pfizer's manufacturing site in Puurs, Belgium.
